TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SerializerDescriptor extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides information about installed plug-in serializers.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Plug-in serializer classes derive from and implement the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory> interface.
## Examples The following examples illustrate using a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor> to return information on installed plug-in serializers.
[!code-csharp[DocumentSerialize#DocSerializePlugIn](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DocumentSerialize/CSharp/ThumbViewer.cs#docserializeplugin)]
[!code-csharp[DocumentSerialize#DocSerializeFileFilter](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DocumentSerialize/CSharp/ThumbViewer.cs#docserializefilefilter)]

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the assembly that contains the serializer.
Docs.value: The name of the assembly (usually a DLL) that contains the plug-in serializer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean

Docs.param: The object to be compared with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.Equals%2A> returns `true` even if the two objects differ in one or more of the following properties: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.ManufacturerName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.ManufacturerWebsite%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.IsLoadable%2A>.

public: property System::String ^ FactoryInterfaceName { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the derived class that implements the serializer.
Docs.value: The name of the derived class that implements the serializer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

Docs.summary: Gets the unique hash code value of the serializer.
Docs.returns: The unique hash code value of the serializer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The unique hash code value is created based on the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyPath%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.FactoryInterfaceName%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A> properties of the serializer.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsLoadable As Boolean
public: property bool IsLoadable { bool get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the serializer can be loaded with the currently installed version of the .NET Framework.
Docs.value: if the serializer assembly can be loaded; otherwise, . The default is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.IsLoadable%2A> should be `false` unless <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A> has the same value as <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.
## Examples The following examples illustrate using <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.IsLoadable%2A> to determine if the associated plug-in serializer can be loaded and used.
[!code-csharp[DocumentSerialize#DocSerializeFileFilter](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DocumentSerialize/CSharp/ThumbViewer.cs#docserializefilefilter)]
[!code-csharp[DocumentSerialize#DocSerializePlugIn](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DocumentSerialize/CSharp/ThumbViewer.cs#docserializeplugin)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WinFXVersion As Version
public: property Version ^ WinFXVersion { Version ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the version of the .NET Framework required by the serializer.
Docs.value: The version of the .NET Framework required by the plug-in serializer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A> must have the same value as the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A> or the serializer assembly cannot be loaded.
